header.subtitle: Most popular among drivers in PA

content.body:
### Shop 37x12.50R18 Tire Size
Trucks that are equipped with lift kits (think Chevy Silverado 2500, Dodge RAM 2500, Ford F-250, Toyota Tundra) need an extra measure of ground clearance, and that’s where big tires come in. The 37x12.50R18 is a supersize tire you might find on trucks like these.

Adding a lift kit to a vehicle is typically done for off-road driving, so mud terrain tires are a great choice for drivers who need extra grip in deep mud, rocks, and stones. Consider the General Grabber X3, BFGoodrich Mud-Terrain T/A KM3, [Nitto Trail Grappler M/T](https://simpletire.com/brands/nitto-tires/trail-grappler-m-t), and Maxxis Razr MT-772 if you need extra traction and durability in tough off-road conditions.

Maybe you only spend a little bit of time off-road, so you need a tire that performs on- and off-road. All-terrain tires give drivers the best of both worlds, so check out the [Falken Wildpeak A/T3W](https://simpletire.com/brands/falken-tires/wildpeak-a-t3w), Toyo Open Country A/T III, Nitto Ridge Grappler, and Kanati Trail Hog if you want a set of 37x12.50R18 tires that performs on any terrain.

Whether you need a mud terrain, all-terrain, or another type of tire for your lifted truck, SimpleTire has a set of 37x12.50R18 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
